name: Square 99: 2 Extreme Block
description:
Square 99: 2 Extreme Block Puzzle Game, which also named Qblock is a classic addictive wooden style block puzzle game. Qblock challenges you to fit blocks of different shapes into a 9x9 grid. Square 99: 2 Extreme Block (Qblock) is a real classic, no time limit and totally free elimination game. Play Square 99: 2 Extreme Block - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) everyday, find the brand new combo mode in this classic block puzzle game.

How to Play Wood Block Puzzle - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) :
- Drag and drop blocks into 9x9 grid
- Fill the blocks with a row or column or square to eliminate them
- Game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks
- Blocks CAN be rotated
- Reward scores for each step and every row or column or square of blocks you eliminated
- Get as many scores as you can to become the best block crush atSquare 99: 2 Extreme Block - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game!



**Features of Square 99: 2 Extreme Block - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) :
- Completely free to play
- Truly enjoy the fun of puzzle game: NO wifi needed
- Pure game environment: NO time limit
- Innovation in the classics: Provide a grid to place a temporarily unwanted block
- Brand New combo mode: 4 times or more combo will cause a round of shaking
- Brisk game sound effects
- Quick to understand rules, easy to control
- Elaborate interface: wooden style gets you close to nature.
- Constantly update the various shapes of blocks, classic and challenging
- Simple and addictive!
- Support game scores recording, support friend rankings, come and find our more services at Square 99: 2 Extreme Block - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game!

***Share Square 99: 2 Extreme Block - Free Classic Block Puzzle Game (Qblock) with your friends, spend leisure time together and get close to each other!
